title: Dark Deception Free Download (Chapter 1-4)
description:

This is the first chapter in the Dark Deception story. Investigate and survive the first maze. Be careful though. You are not alone. There are monsters in there and they are looking for you. You will face your fears. The question is â€“ what are you afraid of?
